definition: Mabian Yizu autonomous county in Sichuan
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
suffix of a noun of locality
Mabian Yizu autonomous county in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan
Mabian Yizu Autonomous County in Leshan 樂山|乐山[Le4 shan1], Sichuan
pinyin: Ma3 bian1 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: Lineage is passed on the stallion side.
One of the roles of an adaptive horse riding assistant is side-walking.
sentences.chinese: 自適應的一騎助手的作用之一是馬邊走。
